meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of an organism.
meanings.sent1: The organismal features of the plant help it survive in its environment.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the organismal behavior of animals to understand their habits.
meanings.sent3: The organismal dance moves of the bee made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and lively as the organismal colors of a tropical fish.
meanings.sent5: The organismal patterns on the butterfly's wings were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the entire organism.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the organismal structure of the body is crucial for medical research.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian examined the organismal health of the dog during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The organismal size of the elephant made it hard to fit through the door.
meanings.sent4: The team worked together like the different parts of an organismal system.
meanings.sent5: The organismal unity of the forest ecosystem was a sight to behold.
